GSD.product_version: versions from v5.17 to before v6.0.8
GSD.description:
KVM: Reject attempts to consume or refresh inactive gfn_to_pfn_cache

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.8 by commit bfa9672f8fc9eb118124bab61899d2dd497f95ba, it was introduced in version v5.17 by commit 982ed0de4753ed6e71dbd40f82a5a066baf133ed. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: KVM: Reject attempts to consume or refresh inactive gfn_to_pfn_cache
